entities.description: The month in which the respondent first had a drink of an alcoholic beverage.
The time elapsed since the respondent last drank an alcoholic beverage.
Total number of days the respondent used alcohol in the past 12 months.
Indicator specifying whether the reported days of alcohol use are trimmed to 365 days or another frequency.
Trimmed number of days used alcohol if the usage was less than 12 months.

relationships.description: The month in which the respondent indicates their first alcohol consumption.
The time frame since the respondent last consumed alcohol.
Number of days the respondent used alcohol in the past 12 months.
Specifies the trimming indicator used for the alcohol use report.
Trimmed number of days the respondent used alcohol if used for less than 12 months.
